citations.narrative:
* Two metal self-feeders use to feed two adult dogs metal surfaces was rusting and corroding. These areas where along
the side of the feeder and the area where to dogs eat out of.
Four enclosure's outside the main building have black powder coated pipe framed panels used to house four adult dogs.
The metal framing's surface along the bottom divider and front panels has paint coming off exposing the bare metal.
These areas are excessively corroding, rusting and or flaking. The mentioned excessively rusting and corroding surfaces
can affect the structural strength of the surfaces and or prevent required cleaning and sanitation increasing disease
hazards for the dogs.
For the structural integrity and required sanitation and cleaning, all rusty, flaking and corroding metal surfaces must be
kept free of excessive rust.
To be corrected by, 16-September-2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(1)(i) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
* Two metal self-feeders use to feed two adult dogs metal surfaces was rusting and corroding. These areas where along 
the side of the feeder and the area where to dogs eat out of.  
Four enclosure's outside the main building have black powder coated pipe framed panels used to house four adult dogs. 
The metal framing's surface along the bottom divider and front panels has paint coming off exposing the bare metal. 
These areas are excessively corroding, rusting and or flaking. The mentioned excessively rusting and corroding surfaces 
can affect the structural strength of the surfaces and or prevent required cleaning and sanitation increasing disease 
hazards for the dogs.  
 
For the structural integrity and required sanitation and cleaning, all rusty, flaking and corroding metal surfaces must be 
kept free of excessive rust.  
 
To be corrected by, 16-September-2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
